title: Hub
description: A Hub is used to subscribe to an event notification

id.description: This is the unique-id for your subscription - referenced when updating or deleting a subscription

query.description: This is a query string used to filter notifications in the context of the notifier

callback.description: This is the URI that will be POST'ed to when a notification is triggered

@schemaLocation.description: A link to a JSON-Schema file that defines additional attributes and relationships

@baseType.description: When sub-classing, this defines the super-class

@type.description: When sub-classing, this defines the sub-class entity name
